First Responders Benefit Game

The St. Louis Jr. Blue are proud to announce the 2024 First Responders Benefit Game scheduled for February 24, 2024 at 3:30pm vs. the Wisconsin Woodsmen at Affton Ice Rink. The Jr. Blues will be auctioning off special reversible jerseys that honor First Responders. ...
